[弓]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – a bow. See also the original version of 射 . Unrelated to 弗 . See also 夷 .

[弖]
variant form of 互

[互]
Ideogram ( 指事 ): 牙 and a distinguishing mark. Early texts often used 互 and 牙 interchangeably.

[亙]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 二 + 月 ( “ moon ” ) .
Possibly also the original form of 恆 .
